channel.title: Joomlapolis News
channel.description: Joomla social networking and Subscription Management software. Community Builder is the top rated, best supported, most complete and reliable community system there is for Joomla!

item.title: Joomla 3.5 and Community Builder 2.0.14 Released
item.description:
Both PHP7 ready - Joomla 3.5 and Community Builder 2.0.14 are here!

Joomla 3.5 is now available with 34 new features and many bug fixes. But there are also some backwards incompatibilities that could influence upgrades and some third party extensions.

Community Builder 2.0.14 has also been released with new features and bug fixes. CB 2.0.14 is highly recomended for Joomla 3.5 as it addresses a "Failed to start session" error on logout introduced with Joomla 3.5.0.

About Joomla 3.5

The main new features of Joomla 3.5 are:

  • Drag and Drop images in TinyMCE editor
    No need to select and upload images in new editor. Just drag and drop an image from your computer to your editor window.
  • PHP 7 support
    Joomla will now work in PHP 7 environments which may lead to major performance improvements (up to double speed and half memory usage), but a backwards compatibility break had to be introduced to support PHP7.  We believe that this known B/C break will not affect the vast majority of extensions (CB is not affected).
  • Email notifications when new Joomla release is available
    This new feature will send website admins an email notification/reminder when a new release is available.
  • Editor Buttons added to the Toolbar
    You no longer need to scroll down the page to find the “readmore” or “insert image” buttons. Editor extension buttons that used to be placed below the text area can now be found in the toolbar where they belong.
  • Easily Insert Modules in Articles
    This lets you easily add a module into an article with a button directly on the editor toolbar.
  • Item counts in relevant Joomla administrative pages
    This new feature makes is easy to quickly see how many published/unpublished/trashed/archived articles each Joomla category. Similar functionality is also available in Contact, Banner and Newsfeed management pages.
  • User Status admininstrative module improvements
    The Joomla backend pages have a fixed footer strip with some useful info and links about your website. You now have more control on what is displayed.
  • Download system/environment info for support cases
    Help support teams to help you by including your website system information using this new functionality.
  • User CSS file for Protostar template
    No more hacking needed to add your extra css code in Joomla's Protostar template. You can now add your user.css file and it will be loaded.
  • Statistics gathering for Joomla usage
    Joomla 3.5's new statistics collection plug-in gathers the system environment in use. The raw data collected is anonymised before transmission and access to the compiled data is publicly available.

In addition to these features Joomla 3.5 has also fixes over 650 bugs.

So the $64K question ... what to do .. upgrade or wait?

As there are no reported high or medium level security issues, there is no security related need to rush and upgrade.

Some may choose to wait a few days (or maybe even for next Joomla 3.5.1) and others may choose to upgrade to Joomla 3.5.  But before upgrading your live sites you should follow the following 3-step guidelines:

  1. Check all thrid-party extensions you have installed on your website and check for Joomla 3.5 compatibility reassurance. If needed install new releases when available.
  2. Clone your website and perform that upgrade to Joomla 3.5 on the cloned environment and test everything before you updrage your live sites.
  3. Always backup your live site before you upgrade, just in case something goes wrong and you need to revert things.

About Community Builder 2.0.14

Community Builder 2.0.14 is here with 3 new features and 13 bug fixes. It also addresses a Joomla 3.5 backwards compatibility issue that caused an error during frontend logout.

The full CB 2.0.14 changelog is available in the forum discussion. CB 2.0.14 can be easily installed over any existing CB 2.0+ environment and will continue to work on Joomla 3.4.8 environments (in addition to the just released Joomla 3.5).

Please note that CB 2.0.14 continues to work just fine an older PHP versions (PHP 5.3.3 and greater).

Discuss this article on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: CBSubs 4.0.2 released with 9 new feautues and 28 bug fixes
item.description:
CBSubs GPL Paid Subscriptions Membership 4.0.2 has been released !

CBSubs is the most powerful paid subscriptions membership solution for Joomla allowing you to make money from your Joomla content by requiring a subscription for content access. With fantastic built-in integrations for Joomla ACL, Community Builder (field updates and protection), GroupJive, AcyMailing, and powerful reminder mailer features and smart promotions (with coupons or automatic) -- CBSubs is a mind blower.

You can download and study the FREE CBSubs Manual that has many use case examples to just begin to realize how powerful and versitile this solution is.

This new CBSubs release has 9 new features and 28 bug fixes and is now PHP 7 ready - see forum discussion for detailed list.

Existing CBSubs installations can upgrade to version 4.0.2 (CB 2.0.13 or better is required) by simply installing over.

Discuss this article on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: 20 social networks - 2.31 bilion users - waiting for you to install the new CB Connect 7.0 stable on your website !
item.description:
According to latest internet stats, there are 2.31 billion users with active social media accounts.

And the just released CB Connect 7.0 (stable) with its awesome list of 20 supported networks and features helps you bring them over to your own website by making it super easy for them to join. No hassle sign-up and no new password setup, is a great combination to attract new users to your website and save user data (with social network's user permissions) to your local user profiles.

The numbers speak for themselves - there is no other add-on for Joomla (or any other CMS as far as we know) that supports so many social networks.

Download CB Connect 7.0

Discuss this on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: CB Connect 7.0 RC1 supports 20 social networks!
item.description:
CB Connect 7.0 RC1 is available for download by all paid members.

This release should have been tagged stable, but our high-quality process mandates a release candidate phase.

CB Connect now supports 20 !!! social network providers letting their users join your website using their favorite social network credentials.

This is a win-win situation with huge benefits for everyone. Website owners open the door for millions of social networking users to join their CB Connect powered website and users can quickly get on board without the need to fill-out new forms remember new password.

Here is the full awesome list:

  1. Facebook
  2. Twitter
  3. Google
  4. Linkedin
  5. Windows Live
  6. Instagram
  7. Foursquare
  8. GitHub
  9. VKontakte
  10. Steam
  11. Reddit
  12. Twitch
  13. Stack Exchange
  14. Pinterest
  15. Amazon
  16. Yahoo
  17. Paypal
  18. Discus
  19. WordPress
  20. Meetup

In addition to the many supported networks, CB Connect can be also configured to:

  • work in Single sign on mode letting users register and login with one click
    -- for quick and simple website joining
  • prefil the registration form with data taken automatically from the social network and letting the user fill in the rest
    -- saves time for sign-ups and lets users override data
  • override approval workflows (on a per social network provider basis) for new users and images brought in from social network (avatar or canvas)
    -- no need to waste time with trusted network data
  • link existing user accounts on your website with social network
    -- make it easy for your existing users to single click login
  • synchronize CB fields with social network available data during registration, login or linking
    -- grab existing data and display on user profiles on your website
  • first redirect and redirect users based on their social network during login
    -- give your social network friends special treatment

As you can see this very powerful add-on is designed to help you boost your website sign-ups by reaching out to millions of social networking website users.

Discuss this on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: CB Connect 7.0 beta 5 - help us test!
item.description:
CB Connect 7.0 beta 5 is available for download and testing by all paid members.

If you have been following this add-on's progress you are probably aware that it was delayed because of its dependency on a third-party API library.

Well, we finally decided to drop this dependency and move forward using our own code.

As Kyle already commented this new beta curently supports authentication from the following 10 social newtwork providers:

  1. Facebook
  2. Twitter
  3. Google
  4. Linkedin
  5. Windows Live
  6. Instagram
  7. Foursquare
  8. GitHub
  9. VKontakte
  10. Steam

There are also plans to add more in upcoming CB Connect 7.0 RC release.

As we are currently in rapid development mode we would like as many people to as possible to download and test this new release and report issues in the forum discussion below.

This way we will quickly reach a stable release.

Join the discussion on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: CB Code Field 1.0 Released!
item.description:
CB Code Field 1.0.2 has been released for CB 2.0.13+
Professional+ members can download

By popular community demand, the CB Team has just released the new CB Code Field add-on that lets you execute PHP code as a CB field!

With this new release you can also create code fields that dynamically auto-refresh when other CB fields change.

Here is a brand new Age Calculation Tutorial that will help you understand this new functionality.

The CB Code Field add-on lets you create as many CB fields as you want that provide output based on PHP code you provide.

Once installed and published you will see 5 new field types available when you create new CB fields:

  • Code
  • Code Check Box (Multiple)
  • Code Drop Down (Multi-select)
  • Code Drop Down (Single Select)
  • Code Radio Buttons

Discuss this on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: CB Query Field 5.0 released!
item.description:
CB Query Field 5.0.2 has been released for CB 2.0.13+
Professional+ members can download

With this new release you are now able to create query fields that dynamically auto-refresh when other CB fields change (think of chained fields like country, state, city combinations).

Here is a brand new USA State, City, Zip code tutorial that will help you understand this new functionality.

The CB Query Field add-on lets you create as many CB fields as you want that take their options from a database query.

Once installed and published you will see 4 new field types available when you create new CB fields:

  • Query
  • Query Check Box (Multiple)
  • Query Drop Down (Multi-select)
  • Query Drop Down (Single Select)
  • Query Radio Buttons

We also have some cool CB Query field video tutorials that you can watch.

 

Discuss this on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: CB 2.0.13 ready for Joomla 3.5 and PHP 7.0
item.description:
Community Builder 2.0.13 is here and is ready for upcoming Joomla 3.5
Download it now - it's free and super stable

Community Builder 2.0.13 is a maintenance release that fixes 21 bugs and adds 6 new features (PHP 7 compatibility, Bootstrap and Fontawesome updates - see forum discussion for full changelog) paving the way for the upcoming Joomla 3.5 release.

CB 2.0+ websites can be upgraded to latest CB 2.0.13 using the built-in Joomla upgrader or with a simple install over (precautionary backup always recommended) as all previous settings are kept.

The CB Primer Book is valid and the CB 2.0 Add-on compatibility chart has been updated.

CB 2.0.13 now supports PHP 5.3.3 to PHP 7. Please note that Joomla 3.5 will be needed for PHP 7 support, as Joomla 3.4 is not PHP 7 compatible.

Discuss this on our forums !
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: Profile Update Logger 2.1.2 Released
item.description:
Profile Update Logger 2.1.2 has been released for CB 2.0.12+

The CB 2.0.12+ compatible Profile Update Logger add-on lets your authorized users quickly view changes made to user profile fields. It keeps track of when changes were made, old and new values and also which user made each change. The add-on can also be configured to send notification emails on each change.

Professional members can download Profile Update Logger 2.1.2 and just install it using the CB Plugin Management installer.

Discuss this on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)

item.title: New Free Primer Book Releases
item.description:
New Primer Book updates released!
Download CB Primer - Download GroupJive Primer

The Community Builder  and GroupJive Primer Books have been updated to be compatible with latest software releases. Both also now contain special sections describing how to upgrade from previous releases.

These are highly recommended resources that you should download and study as - along with the great video tutorials - they will help you take full advantage of Community Builder and GroupJive.

Discuss this on our forums.
item.author: nant@joomlapolis.com (Nick A.)
